title: VERY VERY WEIRD BUG (Please Read)
body:
Not sure if this could be called a bug but the story was like this: I start a classic game as usual. Then when the battle starts I realise I couldn't use my skill because i can't left click (my champion skill is a point and click champion). Everytime i left click, it pings. I tried quick casting my skill but it still pings but this time I can use my skill. Its awful for me and my team because of so much pings coming from me. I also couldn't type which I dunno why. Nothing happens when I press ENTER. Then I realise that I couldn't even shop so I'm stuck with my starting item. In the end we lost of course and my team called me a troll. 

I once played a match where one of the enemy only have his starting item and nothing else. I'm guessing that he have the same problem as me and couldn't shop because of that. He also didn't talk at all in that game.

Thank you for reading and I you have a better day than me.

replies.body: Sounds like your Control or Alt key is stuck or something.

>
> Sounds like your Control or Alt key is stuck or something.

This is probably it, happens to me all the time. To fix it next time, just tab out then back in. If that doesn't work, restart the client.

I play LoL on a laptop 90% of the time and this happens to me a lot. (and it really sucks when it happens in team fights):

Generally its because my alt or control button is stuck to fix this I just press control or alt(normally both) then it fixes the problem. I this doesn't work idk how to fix it.
you get stuck keys... i take care of mine to they don't stick... I just get tabbed for a 10% power warning or a hibernate 8/10 times
I dont get my laptop keys stuck as much anymore but they used to be really bad and it used to be real annoying when your pinging target (champion) when your trying to attack or use spells.
honestly never liked using alt and ctrl in games, so i used g and v to ping
